issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI -> Views ->scroll views -->basic.

h5.Actual Result:
1. We get a blank scrollview.

h5.Expected Result:
1. We should get a scrollview with a button "add to scroll view" & tapping on it should add a red view at the bottom of the scrollview.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: BaseUI > Views > scroll views > basic; Opening test gives us empty scrollview
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634
Ti SDK : 3.2.2.GA
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.1	
CLI - 3.2.3-dev
BB Z10 - 10.2.1.2.2156
Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body:

Mac OSX 10.9.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201405121247
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140514163013
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0-dev
Alloy: 1.4.0-alpha
BlackBerry SDK: 10.3
BlackBerry Simulator: 10.3.0.440

Red view is added to the bottom of the scrollview.
Closing
